::Shredder::

Shredder arrives at the location that he was supposed to be at, looking around and seeing nothing at first. He steps back once as something starts to appear in front of him, his weapons instantly in his hands.

"What in the pit?" he asks no one in particularly as the ship in front of him becomes fully visible. It didn't look familiar, and he had no idea why anyone on it would want to talk to him. He stands there, waiting for a door to open or for someone to exit.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  He watched the bleep head towards him. It was shredder. A worthy comrade and 
> follower. He zoomed in on the probes pictures. Looking at the terrain of the  
> area he had to find a good place to make a permanent settlement.
